label: 御内
本: State of War: the Violent Order of Fourteenth Century Japan . Michigan University Press . 2003
説明文: Term used to describe all dependent warriors. These men were not, however, confined to being followers of the Hōjō shikken, as was stipulated in the Sata mirensho. By contrast, see tozama. [北条執権、沙汰未練書、外様]
